commit message: Test suite refactored to ease Public Timeline addition

Starting implementing Public timeline

Fixed 'Loading...' didn't disappear sometimes

Fixed retries (were 0), public timeline. Better command execution
logging.
Implemented Cancellation of the background timeline loading.
Progress dialog during upgrade
The whole initialization during upgrade is asynchronous

Refactoring. DbUtils.closeSilently introduced to close all Closeable
objects silently and reliably.
Fixed uncaught exception during removal of non-existent message
Options menu added to Account activity to allow opening Settings of AndStatus

User manual updated (in English and in Russian).

or 'combined' mode

Additional fixes for Fast Scroll Thumb

Added generic permissions to the exported services/providers

Async loader refactored out of TimelineActivity
according to the Android LoaderManager/Loader pattern,
introduced in API 11. No dependency on API 11.

List requery on content change moved to the background task.
